product_name: Estee LauderDayWear Multi-Protection Anti-Oxidant 24H Cream Moisturizer SPF 15
summary: SummaryHighlightsSustainable PackagingEstée Lauder DayWear Multi-Protection Anti-Oxidant 24H Cream Moisturizer SPF 15 defends against signs of premature aging and diminishes their appearance, with Estée Lauder's most effective antioxidant power ever.
details: DetailsBenefitsHydrating cream infuses skin with an intense surge of moisture that lasts 24 hoursReduces the first signs of aging, like dullness & fine, dry linesLightweight, refreshing texture, ideal for normal/combination skinWon't cause breakouts or clog pores (non-acnegenic)Dermatologist-testedFeaturesBroad Spectrum SPF 15Super antioxidant complex*In vitro testing, comparing Super Antioxidant Complex with widely used antioxidants such as alpha-lipoic acid, kinetin, vitamins C and E, co-enzyme Q10 & IdebenoneItem 2309608How To UseIn the morning, apply on clean skin, after your Repair serum.IngredientsActive: Avobenzone 3.00%, Octisalate 5.00%. Inactive: Water\Aqua\Eau, Dimethicone, Butyloctyl Salicylate, Butylene Glycol, Polyester-8, Cetyl Ricinoleate, Steareth-21, Steareth-2, Di-C12-15 Alkyl Fumarate, Caprylic/Capric/Myristic/Stearic Triglyceride, Polysilicone-11, Psidium Guajava (Guava) Fruit Extract, Gentiana Lutea (Gentian) Root Extract, Polygonum Cuspidatum Root Extract, Stearyl Alcohol, Hordeum Vulgare (Barley) Extract\Extrait D'orge, Laminaria Ochroleuca Extract, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract, Triticum Vulgare (Wheat) Germ Extract, Artemia Extract, Fumaria Officinalis Flower/Leaf/Stem Extract, Caffeine, Pentylene Glycol, Citrus Medica Limonum (Lemon) Fruit Extract, Hydrolyzed Rice Extract, Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Seed Extract, Hydrolyzed Rice Bran Extract, Lauryl PEG-9 Polydimethylsiloxyethyl Dimethicone, Thermus Thermophillus Ferment, Behenyl Alcohol, Acrylic Acid/VP Crosspolymer, Triacontanyl PVP, Glycerin, C12-15 Alkyl Benzoate, Linoleic Acid, Cholesterol, Squalane, Sodium PCA, 1,2-Hexanediol, Urea, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Dipropylene Glycol Dibenzoate, Tocopheryl Acetate, Acrylamide/Sodium Acryloyldimethyltaurate Copolymer, Tetrahexyldecyl Ascorbate, Sodium Hyaluronate, Ergothioneine, Isohexadecane, PPG-15 Stearyl Ether Benzoate, Glycyrrhetinic Acid, Trehalose, Polyquaternium-51, Polysorbate 80, Lecithin, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Fumaric Acid, Palmitoyl Hydroxypropyltrimonium Amylopectin/Glycerin Crosspolymer, Caprylyl Glycol, Cyclodextrin, Sodium Hydroxide, Nordihydroguaiaretic Acid, Sodium Chloride, Ascorbyl Tocopheryl Maleate, Fragrance (Parfum), Citric Acid, Ethylbisiminomethylguaiacol Manganese Chloride, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Disodium EDTA, BHT, Sodium Dehydroacetate, Phenoxyethanol, Blue 1 (CI 42090), Yellow 5 (CI 19140), Chromium Hydroxide Green (CI 77289).Please be aware that ingredient lists may change or vary from time to time. Please refer to the ingredient list on the product package you receive for the most up to date list of ingredients.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: In the morning, apply on clean skin, after your Repair serum.

reviews.headline: Would buy again
reviews.comments: Goes on nicely, doesn't feel greasy at all, made my skin nice and flawless. It doesn't break me out at all, instead, made my skin clear!!

reviews.headline: Very hydrating and smooth to put on.
reviews.comments: I've been using this moisturizer for years and love it so much. It's very easy to blend into my skin and makes it so soft.

reviews.headline: I have bought this product for years
reviews.comments: I love this product. It is gentle on my face with no burn, blistering or rash. I have used it for close to 50 years and would recommend for any age or skin. It has a pleasant smell and doesn't leave your skin greasy. A gentle moisturizer for your face.

reviews.headline: Great product
reviews.comments: I absolutely love this product!  It has an amazing cucumber scent and is moisturizing to the skin but does not feel heavy.

reviews.headline: Luxurious
reviews.comments: I have tried and will continue to try different products but not because this is not working.  This is my favorite moisturizer.  It has taken me from my breakout years to fine lines with the best results. People are always surprised to find out my age.  And I am old enough to know people genuinely mean that.  I love to experiment with other products  because thats what we do but this is the best.

reviews.headline: Daycare face cream
reviews.comments:
I've been using Este Lauder for years.
Love the creamy feel of the daycare cream.
Especially like the SPF protection for me face as well.

reviews.headline: Mom's Favorite Moisturizer
reviews.comments: I bought this for my mother as a Christmas gift, she was thrilled since her jar ran out some time ago.  This is a great moisturizer, it lasts all day and leaves a soft, supple feel.  The price is a bit of an inhibitor for some but it works well.

reviews.headline: Love it!
reviews.comments:
This is a fantastic moisturizer for daily use.
It has a lightweight yet deeply hydrating formula, making it perfect for normal to combination skin. The added SPF 15 offers some sun protection, which is a bonus for daytime wear. The scent is subtle and fresh, and it absorbs quickly without leaving any greasy residue. My skin feels smoother, healthier, and more radiant after using it regularly. Definitely a high-quality product worth the investment.

reviews.headline: Best all around moisturizer!!
reviews.comments: This has been my go to moisturizer for years! Smells good and makes my skin very smooth!! I also use the nighttime Estée Lauder for  bedtime!!

reviews.headline: The best moisturizer ever!
reviews.comments: I love everything about this moisturizer from the fresh wonderful smell to the way my skin drinks it up. Feels like a drink of natural goodness for my skin.

reviews.headline: I do buy this again and again.
reviews.comments: I have used this for years.

reviews.headline: Not sure about smell sadly
reviews.comments: To be fair I have only used this sun screen once, the smell is a cucumber melon smell, it's not unpleasant but I prefer very light smells, natural or non scented products for my face since I tend to smell it all day. The scent is fairly strong to me.

reviews.headline: Be very careful of this product if you have allergies.
reviews.comments: While this cream has lovely smell and goes on smoothly, it is devastating if you have any kind of allergies.  It took several days for my eyes to stop watering, and they were bloodshot even longer.  I only used on my cheeks and chin, well away from the eyes, but that did not help.

reviews.headline: Yes
reviews.comments: Works well.

reviews.headline: Contains irritating fragrance
reviews.comments: I love this product very much. I was hoping my skin would adjust after a couple of weeks but with the added fragrance my skin turns red and burns badly. I do not recommend for those with sensitive skin.

reviews.headline: Perfect Moisturizer
reviews.comments: I love this moisturizer.  Have been using it for several years.  I use as my daytime moisturizer, wear it under my makeup.  It makes my makeup go on smoothly and flawlessly.  I have oily skin and this doesn't ever cause my skin to be greasy or breakout. I am 54 years old and this helps keep makeup from settling in fine lines.

reviews.headline: HAVE USED THIS PRODUCT FOR 15 YEARS
reviews.comments: I have used this wonderful Estee Lauder product daily for 15 years and will use it daily for 15 more years.  This is great product.  Highly Recommend!

reviews.headline: I use the DayWear Matte oil control gel
reviews.comments: I was having a hard time finding a good moisturizer that didn't irritate my skin or feel too heavy. I've been using it consistently for about three months now and I think I will continue to use it!

reviews.headline: Love this moisturizer
reviews.comments: Nice light moisturizer that doesn't break me and is not heavy at all. I love it

reviews.headline: Favorite moisturizer!
reviews.comments: I have tried so many face moisturizers and I've been stuck on this one for well over a year. It's not too heavy. No overwhelming smell. No shine. No breakouts. My face has always been sensitive to breakouts and this one keeps my skin clear. Make-up lays over well.

media.headline: Can't live without Daywear

media.headline: Not Worth the Cost
media.caption: This moisturizer made my skin oily and shiny.

faceoff_positive.comments: I have been using this product for years. I have experimented with other moisturizers but none even come close to the skin benefits of my Day Wear. I use it with Idealist. The combination of the two are wonderful to my skin. I would never use any other product. I am 68 years old and look 50. Aside from a great gene pool, my Day Wear has contributed immensely!
faceoff_positive.headline: Day Wear

faceoff_negative.comments: I been using the day wear for a month now and at this moment my face have a break out.. i love all your products and i still can belive it.. i stop using it for a week now and my face its getting better... little by little..
faceoff_negative.headline: break out
